title: Fire Wall
description: Jack Kincade is fast becoming one of the hottest drivers on the stock car circuit, with high hopes of making it to the big time. But when a beautiful young reporter asks to tag along with the team and do a story on them, Jack ends up falling engine over axle for her. And as if his new love isn't enough of a distraction, a much more dangerous one awaits him on the racetrack - in the form of B.J. Thornton, a reckless new driver on the circuit. Because the sinister Thornton isn't racing to win - he's racing to settle a very old, personal score. And for him, it doesn't much matter who gets the checkered flag, just as long as Jack Kincade isn't alive to see it...
author: James Pruitt
